## Open-source tools

💻 `mape_municipios-dashboard`: a dashboard to interact with one of the most complete databases with information on Brazilian municipalities, collected by [MAPE](https://mape.org.br/). 2025.  
_Joint work with Fernando Meireles (IESP-UERJ)_.  
🔗 [Source code](https://github.com/mape-iesp/MAPEmunicipios-Dashboard) · 🌐 [Access link](https://mape-municipios-dashboard.streamlit.app/)

💻  `RelicárIA`: a digital platform that combines AI and data analysis to extract and visualize information from documents. 2025.  
_Joint work with Danielle Sanches de Almeida (FGV ECMI)_.  
🔗 [Source code](https://github.com/felipelmc/RelicarIA) · 🌐 [Access link](https://relicaria.streamlit.app/)

💻  `BoticárIA`: a RAG-based conversational AI that simulates an 18th-century apothecary, providing information on medicinal practices based on historical pharmacological sources from the late 18th century. 2025.  
_Joint work with Danielle Sanches de Almeida (FGV ECMI)_.  
🔗 [Source code](https://github.com/felipelmc/BoticarIA) · 🌐 [Access link](https://boticaria.streamlit.app/)
